name: Starship Defender
description:
This game is a completed eBook tutorial created to introduce first time programmers to the exciting world of HTML5 game development. The parent eBook is available at the Leanpub Website and takes you step by step through the process of writing this game using the Phaser Javascript Framework.

You learn how to animate sprites, implement physics, develop game logic and the basic skills to enable you to build any game you can imagine.
